name: Marvel War of Heroes
summary:
Mobile card-battle game set in the Marvel Universe.
Build a unique deck to gain strength and battle against infamous Marvel super villains.
Enhance your power against stronger foes by evolving, fusing and refreshing your card deck.
Every play experience is different, with new cards and events added on a regular basis.
